message.body: You guys still thinking about getting a cabin? I am free the 11th-18th, might go to Vermont if the dates don't line up...
Looking doubtful. Maybe camping. I'm gonna be broke. Gotta drop $4000 on a new place in the next few weeks
Gonna beach it up though. You should come for a day or two. I'm gonna try and make it down there too
Sooo many monies!!! Gots to save! I'm craving me some mountains. I think I might go to Vermont then and try to take a city trip in the fall!

I hear ya. I want mountains too. Once I get settled planning on taking short trips on my days off. I'm sick (as usual) in bed watching Anthony bourdains new show...forgot how much I love him. Giving me the travel itch.
Haven't gotten one yet. Probably have one in two weeks. Gonna be by my work or by Ryan's.
So excited to live alone though!
Living alone is da bomb! Moving is not though. I have a 2 screenings in Louisville and at VCU in sept and Oct. and a conference in Oct. shooting 3 Fridays in upper PA. So much!
Wowzers. Busy gal. Get yourself a cheap ride!
I hope you find a good apartment
